issue.title: orbit viewer ray-tracing sometimes doesn't work on models without collision model

content.raw:
hmm only with some models though ...

- Connor Kenway (Assassins Creed) gets ignored:  www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/assassins_creed.tar.gz 
- Hulk works: www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/hulk.tar.gz

Maybe gazebo is more intimidated by Hulk? :P

Edit: actually even hulk gets ignored sometimes when clicking from a different camera angle (usually when the camera is closer to the ground). 

Btw both models had their textures loaded properly after exporting them to collada using Meshlab or Sketchup8.
content.html:
hmm only with some models though ...

  • Connor Kenway (Assassins Creed) gets ignored: www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/assassins_creed.tar.gz
  • Hulk works: www.seas.upenn.edu/~thomasko/hulk.tar.gz

Maybe gazebo is more intimidated by Hulk? :P

Edit: actually even hulk gets ignored sometimes when clicking from a different camera angle (usually when the camera is closer to the ground).

Btw both models had their textures loaded properly after exporting them to collada using Meshlab or Sketchup8.
